issue.title: [CF 1126] Icon Notification - Click - Macrotext
issue.body:
It might be a very weird question and probably out of the scope of the addon. I was wondering if there was a way to turn a condition icon that track the presence of a Talent on the player and on click of the icon it would learn that specific talent.

I can make this part work the problem is I need to know if I can turn said Icon into a "macro" to unlearn the talent in that row such as :

icon:SetAttribute("macrotext", string.format([=[
   /click PlayerTalentFrameTab2
   /click PlayerSpecTab%d
   /click PlayerTalentFrameTalentsTalentRow%dTalent%d
   /click StaticPopup1Button1
   /run AngryBossReminders:LearnTalent(%d)
]=], GetActiveSpecGroup(), tier, column, talentID))

This could work before I use LearnTalent(xxxx)

This is the icon I have so far

^1^T^SType^Sconditionicon ^SUnAlpha^N0.15 ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SType^SLua ^SLua^S--~`<Untitled~`Lua~`Code>~J ~J local~`icon~`=~`...~J ~J --Your~`code~`goes~`here:~M~J ~M~J local~`f,s=GetTalentRowSelectionInfo(6)~M~J ~M~J if~`s~`~|=~`19819~`then~M~J ~`~`~`~M~J ~`~`~`---~`Unlearn~`Current~`Talent~`Code~`goes~`here.~M~J ~M~J ~`~`~`LearnTalent(19819)~M~J end~J ~J ~J ~J  ^SEvent^SOnLeftClick ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STextLayout^Sicon1 ^t^t^SShowWhen^N3 ^SCustomTex^S116847 ^SEnabled^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^STALENTLEARNED ^SLevel^N1 ^SName^SRushing~`Jade~`Wind ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^t^N73101^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

comments.body:
I can't help you with this because of the bad precedent that it sets for everyone else who wants me to make icons click interactive. And honestly, I'm not even sure if it can work with TMW. I will point you at http://www.curse.com/addons/wow/quick-talents for something to look at and borrow code from, though.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Yeah this is pretty much where I took the code from hehe ... I should over be fine was just wondering if it was possible to set "action" to the icon for the on click. I will just keep the icon to warn me and use quick talent to do the job hehe
